name: Attuned_Gladiators_Javelin_C
display_help: Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}%, reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}% and endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%. NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses. You get the set bonuses not marked "(PvP)" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.
power_short_helps: Enhances Damage, Reduces Endurance Cost and Increases Attack Rate
